report.title: App - Get NPMS+ Plots For User
report.description: List of plots of a given user ID. Used by Karolis to setup app. Report contains IDs hard-coded to live Warehouse.
report.query: SELECT distinct #columns# FROM groups g JOIN groups_users gu on gu.group_id=g.id AND gu.user_id=#warehouse_user_id# AND gu.deleted=false JOIN groups_locations gl on gl.group_id=g.id and gl.deleted=false JOIN locations square on square.id = gl.location_id AND square.location_type_id = 18071 AND square.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id = square.id AND plot.location_type_id in (18678,18679,18680) AND plot.deleted=false #joins# WHERE g.website_id=106 AND (g.id=#project_id# OR #project_id#=0) AND g.deleted=false
